name: Mobile Suit Maintenance Bays
desc: All mobile suits get %s resistance to EMP, reduced damage taken to weapons and engines by %s.

name: Akoya-Pattern Starship Engines
desc: Special Engines developed by Akoya Interstellar Industries that Increase the durability of the ship's engines by %s, and the ship's hull integrity by %s. The ship's sensor profile is also reduced by %s.
short: Makes engines harder to disable, lowers sensor profile.

name: Degraded Akoya-Pattern Starship Engines
desc: Special Engines developed by Akoya Interstellar Industries that Increase the durability of the ship's engines by %s and the ship's sensor profile is also reduced by %s. However as these particular engines have been poorly maintained, their effects have somewhat degraded
short: Makes engines harder to disable, lowers sensor profile.

name: Akoya Surplus
desc: This ship has been deemed surplus by the Akoya Interstellar Navy, It has been stripped of it's shield generator and other vital systems. Because of this it's upkeep reduced by %s and CR recovery cost is reduced by %s.

name: Launch Catapult
desc: Increases figther speed by %s for %s after it get deployed.

name: Explorarium Hull Shielding
desc: This ship uses the advanced domain-era Hull shielding techniques found on Explorarium vessels, this grants increased protection against hyperspace storms, reducing the damage inflicted by them by %s.

name: Alaya-Vijnana System
desc: The Alaya-Vijnana System creates a pseudo-brain lobe in the pilot's body using nano-machines, and this allows the pilot's brain to directly process mobile suit data fed through the physical connection. As the pseudo-brain lobe also governs spatial awareness so the pilot's spatial awareness is enhanced. Increasing maneuverability by %s.
